components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays And Failures to Vodafone Network in Ghana

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to Vodafone Network in Ghana. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the United States and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 October 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 18 October 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via United States and Canada short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Our SMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 16 October 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 18 October 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States handsets via United States short codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

16 October 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 17 October 2024 at 03:00 PDT
17 October 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 18 October 2024 at 03:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
